task.title: Software users
task.desc: Customers who prefer to enjoy the service we offer rather than buying the equipment, we recommend them to directly download the "Easyprint"app.
task.desc2: Easyprint has become one of the most famous printer service which can give you the A+ customer service experience.
task.desc3: You can choose to pay-for-print ways. One way is to despoit the buck to your Easyprint account, it would depends on you of how much you want to deposit.And everytime, you can choose to print the black-white paper or the colorful one. The advantage of that is you do not need to worried about wasting money monthly.You can also choose to subscribe the print service plan below.
